WORK & LEADERSHIP EXPERIENCE

QMAT Capital

Financial Analyst, Intern December, 2023– Present

  • QMAT Capital is a quantitative hedge fund startup with AUM of $600K.
  • Conducting in-depth market research and evaluating indicators to generate investment ideas and build trading strategies.
  • Performing technical analysis using Trading view platform to identify support and resistant zones of stock prices’ movement to establish investment opportunities for trading options.
  • Implementing effective hedging strategies using statistical models in trading options to mitigate risks of an investment

Rational Capital Investment Fund (RCIF)

Analyst Candidate Program September, 2022– April, 2023

  • Participate in weekly discussions of case studies to gain insights of the market and build detailed thesis for potentially undervalued companies.
  • Prepared in-depth investment reports on an up and coming fashion brand and a vitamin and supplement provider, analyzing the company’s operations, industry, competitive advantages, management, financials, and valuation
  • Placed third in annual RCIF stock pitch competition; pitched Jamieson Wellness to investors; built multi-approach valuation, detailed investment thesis, and presentation deck to support recommendation

Skule Financial Literacy Club

External Director September, 2022– April, 2023 - Worked with team of 10 people to execute effective sponsorship efforts by communicating club’s value to sponsors, securing approximately $700 for each event. - Secured top-tier financial consultants and bankers as motivational speakers for seminars and panels, leading to a 20% increase in attendance. - Assisted speakers and organizers in monthly educational financial events/seminars and proposed budgeting methods to optimize operational expenditure.

Volunteer - ‘I hear your sound’ Project

Head of event September, 2020 – January, 2021 - Secured sponsorship agreements with third parties, generating VND 20,000,000 in funding for a charity concert featuring the disabled band “Nang Moi”, contributing to their financial support and recognition. - Led and managed a team of 20 members to develop and execute innovative promotion strategies. - Implemented an efficient budget allocation system, ensuring that resources were distributed effectively between promotional activities and event coordination.

RELEVANT PROJECTS

Predicting Housing Prices

  • Conducted an in-depth analysis of Seattle housing prices post the Great Recession, employing Python libraries such as pandas and matplotlib to create impactful visualizations.
  • Utilized advanced web scraping techniques to gather external data, significantly enhancing analysis accuracy and comprehensiveness.
  • Developed a robust regression model, providing in-depth market insights and guiding future pricing strategies

Empirical Analysis of Capital Structure’s impact on Profitability Toronto, ON

  • Conducted comprehensive analysis on debt-to-equity ratios and return on equity for U.S. tech companies.
  • Identified a statistically and economically significant relationship with a slope estimate of -0.112 (p-value: 0.001%), challenging the Modigliani-Miller Theorem.
  • Advised investors to prioritize companies with lower debt-to-equity ratios for superior returns
